name: Everlasting Islands
description:
------------Everlasting Islands------------

Our hero! The world is collapsing under it's own weight! You have to save it!
But... But... Are you sure?...
Will reaching the source of corruption actually stop it's own expansion towards our world?
Hero?... "Hero"?
Are you ready to find out, how much your gear and determination is really worth?
Go! Go save our world!

 Let everlasting Islands Stay Forever!

Credits---------------------------------------------------
